__e: I kind of hated you, like, a lot, but I don't anymore.
I hated you and wanted you killed, but I don't want that anymore.
But when I thought it was over, I kept thinking that if... If I died, you would spend the rest of your life thinking that...
That moment, I think I hated him more than anyone...
And I want him to know that you died hating him!
I mean, for all I know, he died thinking that I hate him.
I hated being away from you.
I'd really hate to be in your head.
I tried to be, but he hated being here.
I used to hate coming here when I was a kid.
You know, no matter how much we fought... I've always hated watching you leave.
I hated doing it. But I'd do it again if he asked me to.
I didn't like what I became so I hated what you became.
My dad used to make me watch it and I hated it then, but now I kind of think it's funny.
I would hate it if that was me and people saw this.
Aw, were you sitting there the whole time thinking I hated it?
He hated this even at this time, but we were kind of stuck with it by the time we got there.
To tell you the truth, I'm glad we got out of that town. I hated that school.
But I hated myself... for falling short time and again.
I have hated myself for what I did to you. And I'm telling you now You should have told me then.
Claire, I turned down that job because I would've hated myself.
I mean, I... I figured I, I get it... he hates me for marrying someone other than his brother, but...
You said you hated me for having him.
I've always hated myself for the way I am.
You said you hated me for having him.
But if they didn't hate me so much, then how would I know how good I was?
He didn't hate me because of anything I did, he hated me because of what I am.
